Title.evidence: Randomised Controlled Trial of Coenzyme Q10 Supplementation on Cognitive Function

Objective.evidence: This study evaluates the efficacy of CoQ10 supplementation on cognitive function.

Method_Outcome.evidence: The primary outcome was cognitive function, measured over various timeframes.

Randomisation_Allocation.evidence: Randomisation methods and allocation concealment were not specified.

Result_Outcome.evidence: Twelve studies demonstrated improved cognitive function, and two showed reduced oxidative stress with CoQ10 supplementation.

Trial_Registration.evidence: Trial registration and funding sources were not provided.

Funding.evidence: Trial registration and funding sources were not provided.
